Constructor Detail

PokerDeck

public PokerDeck()
Constructs a standard 52-card deck with no jokers, left in order. More specifically, adds one of each rank from each suit specified by PokerCard.

See Also:
PokerCard
Method Detail

shuffle

public void shuffle()
Shuffles this PokerDeck a minimum of five times using: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisher%E2%80%93Yates_shuffle An interesting paper on this topic may be found here: http://www-stat.stanford.edu/~cgates/PERSI/papers/repeatcards.pdf

Overrides:
shuffle in class Deck<PokerCard>

cardType

public java.lang.Class<PokerCard> cardType()
Description copied from class: Deck
Retrieve this deck's cards' type. The specified return type requires subtypes to implement a means by which new cards of the proper type can be generated.

Specified by:
cardType in class Deck<PokerCard>
Returns:
the class of cards this deck holds
